name: ProntoDoc for Word Conventional Document
summary: Document used by ProntoDoc for Word (PDW), a Microsoft Word plug-in used for generating documents; saves a document template and includes the populated data fields that have been auto-filled from a source database; used for rendering ProntoDoc for Word templates ( .PDW files) into .DOCX , .PDF , and .XPS files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Word with ProntoDoc for Word plug-in
